New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2023 年 12 月 9 日，星期六 10:09:02 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Lotto Powerball results: One lucky player wins $8.25 million prize https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-results-one-lucky-players-wins-825-million-prize/32AHHLL43VB7PLG7XCLUXRFVAU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-results-one-lucky-players-wins-825-million-prize/32AHHLL43VB7PLG7XCLUXRFVAU/ Tonight’s winner is the 18th Powerball multi-millionaire of 2023 Sat, 09 Dec 2023 09:04:26 +0000 Tonight's big win is made up of $8 million from Powerball and a quarter share of the Division One prize.
Auckland Airport delays: Huge queues as passenger processing system crashes https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-airport-delays-huge-queues-as-passenger-processing-system-crashes/L36DNH43CZFBDCNRRZZO5YYJZQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-airport-delays-huge-queues-as-passenger-processing-system-crashes/L36DNH43CZFBDCNRRZZO5YYJZQ/ One traveller described the scene as absolute chaos.Sat, 09 Dec 2023 08:41:13 +0000 An airport spokesperson said a technology outage with the global system that manages government border processing requirements for departing and arriving passengers, has meant airlines needed to use manual processes for checking in passengers.
Two people in a serious condition following Karapiro crashhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-in-attendance-at-serious-karapiro-crash/EX7UQOCMP5B2NHHFJS3SC6PCA4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-in-attendance-at-serious-karapiro-crash/EX7UQOCMP5B2NHHFJS3SC6PCA4/ Motorists are advised to avoid the area and use alternative routes. Sat, 09 Dec 2023 08:26:40 +0000 The crash took place at the intersection of Buckland Road and Karapiro Road at around 4:45pm.
South Island Fires: Helicopters and fire crews battle blazes and strong winds across several regions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/templeton-vegetation-fire-helicopters-and-fire-crews-battle-large-blaze/SOLCWNOMWREN5MARLXYJNXNTNM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/templeton-vegetation-fire-helicopters-and-fire-crews-battle-large-blaze/SOLCWNOMWREN5MARLXYJNXNTNM/ People are being asked to stay away from the areas in question. Sat, 09 Dec 2023 07:41:51 +0000 Firefighters are tackling a vegetation fire at Templeton in the Selwyn District, which was reported shortly after 4pm. Photo/Luigi Cooks
